channel.title: Coding a 317 silab server [TUT]
channel.description:
Ever wanted to know how to code? Keep reading if you want to learn code!! here we go!
Making commands EXAMPLE: ::home Difcult-0
Step 1: go to client.java Step 2:ctrl+f and search for home it shall look like this } } else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("home")) { if (teleblock == true) { sendMessage("A magical force stops you from teleporting."); // made by } else { teleportToX = 3365; teleportToY = 2970; sendMessage("You teleport to Home."); Step 3:See command.equalsignorecase? and the home thing Change the home thing to what ever you want! like hangout Step 4:See TeleportToX = TeleportToY= Its where you start when you typ the command! Step 5:You can change the Sendmessage to everthing !
You done with making the command!!
[MAKING SAFE ZONES]
Difcult:1-3
step 1:Go to client.java and search for public boolean nonwild Step 2:You will see sum shit like this : || (absX >= 3426 && absX <= 3433 && absY >= 3151 && absY <= 3157)
The first X is the X coord in the SouthWest corner of the area you want to make non wilderness. The First Y is the Y coord in the SouthWest corner of the area you want to make non wilderness.
The Second X is the X coord in the NorthEast corner of the area you want to make non wilderness. The Second Y is the Y coord in the NorthEast corner of the area you want to make non wilderness. it need to work now!
[ADDING NPCS] Difcult:o Step1: go to autospawn.cfg Step2: Choose your NPC id you wanna place step 3: When you find your npc you wanna place put the coords of the place there step4:Wanna let npcs talk? go to NPChandler.java and search for the NPC ID or just copy an another npc thing and place the ID of your NPC in it
[ADDING OBJECTS] Difcult-1
Step 1:Open up client.java and search for Makeglobalobject Step 2: Copy 1 of the makeglobal objects IT looks like this: makeGlobalObject(3268, 2925, 4172, -1, 10); // Range Step 3: the First numbers are the coords !,The 4172 is the ID of the object, The -1 is how you wanna place the object like: Right,Left,
You are done!
I hope this help you!
Quentin9

item.title: Coding a 317 silab server [TUT]
item.dc:creator: @quentin9 quentin9
item.description:
@quentin9 wrote:

Ever wanted to know how to code? Keep reading if you want to learn code!! here we go!

Making commands EXAMPLE: ::home
Difcult-0

Step 1: go to client.java
Step 2:ctrl+f and search for home it shall look like this }
} else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase(“home”)) {
if (teleblock == true) {
sendMessage(“A magical force stops you from teleporting.”); // made by
} else {
teleportToX = 3365;
teleportToY = 2970;
sendMessage(“You teleport to Home.”);
Step 3:See command.equalsignorecase? and the home thing Change the home thing to what ever you want! like hangout
Step 4:See TeleportToX = TeleportToY= Its where you start when you typ the command!
Step 5:You can change the Sendmessage to everthing !

You done with making the command!!

[MAKING SAFE ZONES]

Difcult:1-3

step 1:Go to client.java and search for public boolean nonwild
Step 2:You will see sum shit like this :
|| (absX >= 3426 && absX <= 3433 && absY >= 3151 &&
absY <= 3157)

The first X is the X coord in the SouthWest corner of the area you want to make non wilderness.
The First Y is the Y coord in the SouthWest corner of the area you want to make non wilderness.

The Second X is the X coord in the NorthEast corner of the area you want to make non wilderness.
The Second Y is the Y coord in the NorthEast corner of the area you want to make non wilderness.
it need to work now!

[ADDING NPCS]
Difcult:o
Step1: go to autospawn.cfg
Step2: Choose your NPC id you wanna place
step 3: When you find your npc you wanna place put the coords of the place there
step4:Wanna let npcs talk? go to NPChandler.java and search for the NPC ID or just copy an another npc thing and place the ID of your NPC in it

[ADDING OBJECTS]
Difcult-1

Step 1:Open up client.java and search for Makeglobalobject
Step 2: Copy 1 of the makeglobal objects IT looks like this: makeGlobalObject(3268, 2925, 4172, -1, 10); // Range
Step 3: the First numbers are the coords !,The 4172 is the ID of the object, The -1 is how you wanna place the object like: Right,Left,

You are done!

I hope this help you!

Quentin9
